questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
no The figure appears younger than an old man.
no The goggles are not made of wood; they appear to be plastic.
yes There is a contrast between an older-looking individual wearing a smock splattered with paint and a younger-looking individual wearing an oversized t-shirt and goggles.
yes The smock appears to be made of fabric given its texture and the way it hangs.
no The goggles do not appear to be made of wood; they exhibit characteristics typical of plastic.
